title: Ark 21Shares Bitcoin ETF Application Decision Pushed by SEC
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) extended its review of the Ark 21Shares Bitcoin ETF application, as it continues to look at applications from traditional finance heavyweights like BlackRock and Fidelity.

title: Fool Me Once: Ethereum Traders Make More Money After Being Scammed
description: One of the researchers said "burning your fingers is good for you," to an extent, because traders diversify and de-risk.

title: FC Barcelona secures $132 investment for blockchain and NFT venture
description:
The football club has been keen on creating nonfungible token collections for much of the past year.

Spanish football club FC Barcelona has secured a €120 million ($132 million) investment from Libero Football Finance AG and Nipa Capital B.V. for its Web3 initiative Barça Vision.

According to the Aug. 11 announcement, FC Barcelona sold a 29.5% stake in Bridgeburg Invest, the holding company for Barça Vision, in exchange for the capital. "Barça Vision is the Club's initiative to integrate all digital content around Web3 and blockchain including nonfungible tokens (NFTs) and metaverse, which are part of the Club's strategy to build the digital Espai Barça," developers wrote.

Libero is a publicly listed company in Germany consulting football clubs on financial matters. Nipa Capital is a venture capital firm domiciled in the Netherlands. The transaction is subject to the approval of FC Barcelona shareholders and is expected to close in Q4 2023.

Since February 2020, FC Barcelona has partnered with the Chiliz blockchain to create Ethereum-based BAR fan tokens for its sports franchise. In August 2022, Chiliz announced it had purchased a 24.5% stake in FC Barcelona's digital content creation arm Barça Vision for $100 million. 

In May, FC Barcelona launched its first inaugural NFT collection with Plastiks. Dubbed "Unleash Your Passion," the collection features 3,000 animal-themed NFTs at a price of $30 each that the club says will contribute to "removing 35,000,000 kilograms of plastic from our planet."

Subsequently, in July 2022, the football club sold its first NFT "Masterpiece #1 In a way" at Sotheby's New York auction for $693,000. The second collectible in the series, Masterpiece #2 - Empowerment, was sold on OpenSea on June 28, 2023, for $300,231. 

✅| OFFICIAL: FC Barcelona reaches an agreement with Libero Football Finance and private investment advisors NIPA Capital BV to become new partners of Bridgeburg Invest, a Barça Vision trademark.

These investors have acquired 29.5% of the ownership of Barça Vision for €120m,… pic.twitter.com/4aWCMO8iA1

— Barça Buzz (@Barca_Buzz) August 11, 2023

title: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032: Will ETH reach $8000 soon?
description: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032 “The Merge did not change anything for holders/users.” Is that a fact? title: BTC Wallet Seeking Monero-Based Privacy Boost elicits Mixed Reaction in The Crypto Community – Is This The Missing Piece?
description: The privacy-focused Samourai wallet, an open-source Bitcoin wallet, is working on implementing atomic swaps between Monero (XMR) and Bitcoin (BTC) to enhance user privacy. The crypto community reacted in a mixed way with some even calling for the boycott of the Samourai wallet. In the latest development, a privacy-focused open-source Bitcoin wallet – Samourai wallet [...]

title: Airchains Partners with Chainlink BUILD to Drive Adoption of Its Modular Rollup Solution
description: Airchains has joined Chainlink’s BUILD program, aiming to accelerate appchains and rollup technology adoption.  This collaboration grants Airchains exclusive access to Chainlink’s oracle services and technical support, reinforcing network security. Airchains has officially announced its participation in the esteemed Chainlink BUILD program, signifying a significant move to accelerate the growth and adoption of application chains [...]

title: Binance Retains Top Spot Despite 49% Decline In Trading Volume
description:
Binance has managed to retain its top spot in the list of centralized crypto exchanges. Despite losing more than 19% of the crypto market share and witnessing a 49% decline in the total trading volume since the beginning of the year, Binance remains the world’s largest crypto exchange, followed by Upbit and OKX. According to […]

The post Binance Retains Top Spot Despite 49% Decline In Trading Volume appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Litecoin Flashing Bullish Signal As Whales and Sharks Accumulate LTC, Says Santiment – But There’s a Catch
description:
Crypto analytics platform Santiment says that Litecoin (LTC) is flashing bullish after its August 2nd halving event. In a new video strategy session, Santiment’s director of marketing Brian Quinlivan says that it appears the peer-to-peer payments network is forming a bullish divergence as sharks and whales continue to accumulate LTC as price dips. “I like […]
